== Punjihalli (610434) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Punjihalli is a village in the [[Sira ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 148.77 hectares and harbouring 8 households with total population of 33 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Sira]] is at a distance of 15 km. Male population is 14 and female population is 19. Scheduled Caste Population is 2 and Scheduled Tribes population is 17. Census Location Code of the village is 610434<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
